php.com.mk.grocerylist.recyclerAdapters

Class MainListRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MainListRecyclerHolder>
      • php.com.mk.grocerylist.recyclerAdapters.MainListRecyclerAdapter

  • public class MainListRecyclerAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MainListRecyclerHolder>
    Adapter for the list of grocery lists. Handles all the observed changes in that list. A direct implementation of the Adapter design pattern, i.e. acts as an adapter between the recycler view holders and the actual data in the repository.

    • Constructor Summary
